pages.text: Schematics are items which allow you to save structures and replicate them elsewhere.$(br2)First, make a Schematic and Quill. Right click on a block to set the first anchor point, then right click again elsewhere to select a volume. A third right-click will prompt for a schematic name.

Empty Schematics can be written to by a $(l:schematics/schematic_table)Schematic Table$(). Once you've placed them in the world with right-click, you can adjust their position, rotation, and mirroring. Build them by hand using the phantom blocks as a guide, or use a $(l:schematics/schematicannon)Schematicannon$().
